!!!! {"Description"}

{"The positions for a Tile Background. (Used in animation)"}

----

!!!! {"Values"}

* *{"OffTop"}* = 0 - {"Position the background off the tile to the top i.e. CSS top:-100%, left:0%"}
* *{"In"}* = 1 - {"Position the background inside the tile to the top-left i.e. CSS top:0%, left:0%"}
* *{"OffBottom"}* = 2 - {"Position the background off the tile to the bottom i.e. CSS top:100%, left:0%"}
